description: Requires Node Exporter (https://github.com/prometheus/node_exporter) to be installed on the nodes to be monitored.

targets.expr: sum(node_load1 {job="$job", cluster_id=~'$cluster', instance=~'$instance'}) by (cluster_id, instance)/count(node_cpu_seconds_total{job="$job", cluster_id=~'$cluster', instance=~'$instance', mode='system'}) by (cluster_id, instance)

1-(sum(node_memory_MemAvailable_bytes {job="$job", cluster_id=~'$cluster', instance=~'$instance'}) by (cluster_id, instance)) / (sum(node_memory_MemTotal_bytes {job="$job", cluster_id=~'$cluster', instance=~'$instance'}) by (cluster_id, instance))
rate(node_vmstat_pswpin {job="$job", cluster_id=~'$cluster', instance=~'$instance'} [$interval]) + rate(node_vmstat_pswpout {job="$job", cluster_id=~'$cluster', instance=~'$instance'} [$interval])
sum by (job, cluster_id, instance) (rate(node_disk_io_time_seconds_total {job="$job", cluster_id=~'$cluster', instance=~'$instance'} [$interval]))
sum by (job, cluster_id, instance) (rate(node_disk_io_time_weighted_seconds_total {job="$job", cluster_id=~'$cluster', instance=~'$instance'} [$interval]))

sum(node_load1 {job="$job", cluster_id=~'$cluster', instance=~'$instance'}) by (cluster_id, instance)/count(node_cpu_seconds_total{job="$job",  cluster_id=~'$cluster', instance=~'$instance', mode='system'}) by (cluster_id, instance)

sum by (job, cluster_id, instance) (rate(node_cpu_seconds_total {job="$job", cluster_id=~'$cluster', instance=~'$instance', mode="idle"} [$interval]))/sum by (job, cluster_id, instance)(rate(node_cpu_seconds_total {job="$job", cluster_id=~'$cluster', instance=~'$instance'} [$interval]))

sum by (job, cluster_id, instance) (rate(node_cpu_seconds_total {job="$job", cluster_id=~'$cluster', instance=~'$instance', mode="system"} [$interval]))/sum by (job, cluster_id, instance)(rate(node_cpu_seconds_total {job="$job", cluster_id=~'$cluster', instance=~'$instance'} [$interval]))

sum by (job, cluster_id, instance) (rate(node_cpu_seconds_total {job="$job", cluster_id=~'$cluster', instance=~'$instance', mode="user"} [$interval]))/sum by (job, cluster_id, instance)(rate(node_cpu_seconds_total {job="$job", cluster_id=~'$cluster', instance=~'$instance'} [$interval]))

sum by (job, cluster_id, instance) (rate(node_cpu_seconds_total {job="$job", cluster_id=~'$cluster', instance=~'$instance', mode="iowait"} [$interval]))/sum by (job, cluster_id, instance)(rate(node_cpu_seconds_total {job="$job", cluster_id=~'$cluster', instance=~'$instance'} [$interval]))

sum by (job, cluster_id, instance) (rate(node_cpu_seconds_total {job="$job", cluster_id=~'$cluster', instance=~'$instance', mode="steal"} [$interval]))/sum by (job, cluster_id, instance)(rate(node_cpu_seconds_total {job="$job", cluster_id=~'$cluster', instance=~'$instance'} [$interval]))

sum by (job, cluster_id, instance) (rate(node_cpu_seconds_total {job="$job", cluster_id=~'$cluster', instance=~'$instance', mode="softirq"} [$interval]))/sum by (job, cluster_id, instance)(rate(node_cpu_seconds_total {job="$job", cluster_id=~'$cluster', instance=~'$instance'} [$interval]))

sum by (job, cluster_id, instance) (rate(node_cpu_seconds_total {job="$job",  cluster_id=~'$cluster',instance=~'$instance', mode="irq"} [$interval]))/sum by (job, cluster_id, instance)(rate(node_cpu_seconds_total {job="$job",  cluster_id=~'$cluster',instance=~'$instance'} [$interval]))

sum by (job, cluster_id, instance) (rate(node_cpu_seconds_total {job="$job",  cluster_id=~'$cluster',instance=~'$instance', mode="nice"} [$interval]))/sum by (job, cluster_id, instance)(rate(node_cpu_seconds_total {job="$job",  cluster_id=~'$cluster',instance=~'$instance'} [$interval]))
sum by (job, cluster_id, instance) (rate(node_disk_io_time_seconds_total {job="$job", cluster_id=~'$cluster', instance=~'$instance'} [$interval]))
sum by (job, cluster_id, instance) (rate(node_disk_io_time_weighted_seconds_total {job="$job", cluster_id=~'$cluster', instance=~'$instance'} [$interval]))
sum by (job, cluster_id, instance)(rate(node_disk_read_bytes_total {job="$job", cluster_id=~'$cluster', instance=~'$instance'} [$interval]))

((sum by (job, cluster_id, instance)(rate(node_disk_read_bytes_total{job="$job", cluster_id=~'$cluster', instance=~'$instance'}[$interval])))+(sum by (job, cluster_id, instance)(rate(node_disk_written_bytes_total{job="$job", cluster_id=~'$cluster', instance=~'$instance'}[$interval]))))/((sum by (job, cluster_id, instance)(rate(node_disk_reads_completed_total{job="$job", cluster_id=~'$cluster', instance=~'$instance'}[$interval]))) + (sum by (job, cluster_id, instance)(rate(node_disk_writes_completed_total{job="$job", cluster_id=~'$cluster', instance=~'$instance'}[$interval]))))

(sum by (job, cluster_id, instance)(rate(node_disk_write_time_seconds_total {job="$job", cluster_id=~'$cluster', instance=~'$instance'} [$interval])))/(sum by (job, cluster_id, instance)(rate(node_disk_writes_completed_total {job="$job", cluster_id=~'$cluster', instance=~'$instance'} [$interval])))

(sum by (job, cluster_id, instance)(rate(node_disk_read_time_seconds_total {job="$job", cluster_id=~'$cluster', instance=~'$instance'} [$interval])))/(sum by (job, cluster_id, instance)(rate(node_disk_reads_completed_total {job="$job", cluster_id=~'$cluster', instance=~'$instance'} [$interval])))

1-(sum(node_memory_MemAvailable_bytes {job="$job", cluster_id=~'$cluster', instance=~'$instance'}) by (cluster_id, instance)) / (sum(node_memory_MemTotal_bytes {job="$job", cluster_id=~'$cluster', instance=~'$instance'}) by (cluster_id, instance))
rate(node_vmstat_pswpin {job="$job", cluster_id=~'$cluster', instance=~'$instance'} [$interval]) + rate(node_vmstat_pswpout {job="$job", cluster_id=~'$cluster', instance=~'$instance'} [$interval])
process_open_fds {job="$job", cluster_id=~'$cluster', instance=~'$instance'}/ process_max_fds {job="$job", cluster_id=~'$cluster', instance=~'$instance'}
sum by (job, cluster_id, instance) (rate(node_filesystem_device_error {job="$job", cluster_id=~'$cluster', instance=~'$instance'} [$interval]))

title: OS Level Metrics
